### Initialize() {#ae3a8326eff629fec000d741c44b730bd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MipsTargetObjectFile::Initialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp; ctx, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp; TM)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method must be called before any actual lowering is done.

Initialize - this method must be called before any actual lowering is done.

This specifies the current context for codegen, and gives the lowering implementations a chance to set up their default sections.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipstargetobjectfile-h/#l00027">27</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipstargetobjectfile-h">MipsTargetObjectFile.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipstargetobjectfile-cpp/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipstargetobjectfile-cpp">MipsTargetObjectFile.cpp</a>.
